agents.commodities.aircraft.Aircraft¶

class agents.commodities.aircraft.Aircraft(env, *args, uid=None, **kwargs)¶

Bases: Resource

Derived from simpy resource, flights can directly wait for when the resource is available (when the previous flight arrives or else).
